Title: Hyper-V Manager
Description: Hyper-V Manager application is intended to replace standard Windows application, which allows you to control virtualization infrastructure

Project Description
Hyper-V Manager application is intended to replace standard Windows application, which allows you to control virtualization infrastructure


Hyper-V Manager application is intended to replace standard Windows application, which allows you to control virtualization infrastructure.

About

The software is native Win32 Delphi application. It is written mostly for exploratory reasons.

Main features
  • View virtual machine list
